verses.verse: My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H5354>weary<s%> of my <S%H2416>life;<s%> I will <S%H5800>leave<s%> my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> on myself; I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
I will <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H433>God,<s%> Do not <S%H7561>condemn<s%> me; <S%H3045>show<s%> me <S%H5921>why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> you <S%H7378>contend<s%> with me.

Is it <S%H2896>good<s%> to you that you should <S%H6231>oppress,<s%> that you should <S%H3988>despise<s%> the <S%H3018>work<s%> of your <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H3313>shine<s%> on the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked?<s%>
Have you <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh?<s%> or <S%H7200>see<s%> you as <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H7200>sees?<s%>
Are your <S%H3117>days<s%> as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H582>man?<s%> are your <S%H8141>years<s%> as <S%H1397>man's<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%>
That you <S%H1245>enquire<s%> after my <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H1875>search<s%> after my <S%H2403>sin?<s%>
You <S%H1847>know<s%> that I am not <S%H7561>wicked;<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> that can <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
Your <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H6087>made<s%> me and <S%H6213>fashioned<s%> me <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about; yet you do <S%H1104>destroy<s%> me.

<S%H2142>Remember,<s%> I <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you, that you have <S%H6213>made<s%> me as the <S%H2563>clay;<s%> and will you <S%H7725>bring<s%> me <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H7725>again?<s%>
Have you not <S%H5413>poured<s%> me out as <S%H2461>milk,<s%> and <S%H7087>curdled<s%> me like <S%H1385>cheese?<s%>
You have <S%H3847>clothed<s%> me with <S%H5785>skin<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and have <S%H7753>fenced<s%> me with <S%H6106>bones<s%> and <S%H1517>sinews.<s%>
You have <S%H6213>granted<s%> me <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H2617>favor,<s%> and your <S%H6486>visitation<s%> has <S%H8104>preserved<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> things have you <S%H6845>hid<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart:<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H2063>this<s%> is with you.
<S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H2398>sin,<s%> then you <S%H8104>mark<s%> me, and you will not <S%H5352>acquit<s%> me from my <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> I be <S%H7561>wicked,<s%> <S%H480>woe<s%> to me; and <S%H518>if<s%> I be <S%H6663>righteous,<s%> yet will I not <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H7218>head.<s%> I am <S%H7646>full<s%> of <S%H7036>confusion;<s%> therefore <S%H7200>see<s%> you my <S%H6040>affliction;<s%>
For it <S%H1342>increases.<s%> You <S%H6679>hunt<s%> me as a <S%H7826>fierce<s%> <S%H7826>lion:<s%> and <S%H7725>again<s%> you show yourself <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> on me.

You <S%H2318>renew<s%> your <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> me, and <S%H7235>increase<s%> your <S%H3708>indignation<s%> on me; <S%H2487>changes<s%> and <S%H6635>war<s%> are <S%H5973>against<s%> me.

<S%H4100>Why<s%> then have you <S%H3318>brought<s%> me <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H7358>womb?<s%> Oh that I had <S%H1478>given<s%> up the <S%H1478>ghost,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> me!
I should have <S%H1961>been<s%> as though I had not <S%H1961>been;<s%> I should have been <S%H2986>carried<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to the <S%H6913>grave.<s%>
Are not my <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H4592>few?<s%> <S%H2308>cease<s%> then, and let me <S%H7896>alone,<s%> that I may take <S%H1082>comfort<s%> a <S%H4592>little,<s%>
<S%H2962>Before<s%> I <S%H3212>go<s%> from where I shall not <S%H7725>return,<s%> even to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death;<s%>

A <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5890>darkness,<s%> as <S%H652>darkness<s%> itself; and of the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death,<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> any <S%H5468>order,<s%> and where the <S%H3313>light<s%> is as <S%H652>darkness.<s%>
